post.title: blocking content over wireless is illegal - telecom decision crtc 2010-445
post.content: blocking content over wireless is illegal. it's also illegal to slow (throttle) time sensitive data over wireless. http://www.crtc.gc.ca/eng/archive/2010/2010-445.htm http://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/n...e-data-too.ars
